name: Markdown Formatting
description: Tests the model's ability to properly use and format markdown elements in presentation content

prompts.text: Create a presentation about data analysis using proper markdown formatting. Include headings of different levels (H1, H2, H3), emphasis (bold and italic text), code blocks for showing example code, and properly formatted links to resources. Ensure markdown syntax is correctly applied throughout.
expected_elements: Properly formatted headings of multiple levels
Correct use of bold and italic emphasis

prompts.text: Create a technical documentation presentation using advanced markdown features. Include a table of contents with internal links, properly formatted tables, blockquotes for important notes, horizontal rules to separate sections, and inline code references. Ensure all markdown syntax is correctly implemented.
expected_elements: Functional table of contents with internal links

element_variety.description: Appropriate use of various markdown elements
